morningBrief.body: 19" overnight. This is the stuff dreams are made of. Time to call in. 86 trails just opened. The mountain just got a whole lot bigger.

morningBrief.headline: Base Conditions Solid
morningBrief.body: The 44" from this week is still skiing great. No new snow needed (yet). Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today.

morningBrief.headline: The Forecast Looks Loaded
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 1" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. 1 new trail opened today. Storm cycle alert! 21" on the way. Conditions are about to level up.

morningBrief.headline: Blustery and Snowy
morningBrief.body: 113/142 trails spinning, 63 freshly groomed. Snow Wind. Winter flexing today: snow and wind in the forecast. Dress for it.

morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 8" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Keep an eye on the sky - a refresh is coming. A few inches on the way.
